General.Name: Digjam Limited
General.Description: Digjam Limited manufactures and markets fabrics for suiting and casual wear. It offers its fabrics under the DIGJAM brand. The company was formerly known as Digjam Textiles Limited and changed its name to Digjam Limited in March 2016. Digjam Limited was founded in 1948 and is based in Jamnagar, India. As of March 13, 2023, Digjam Limited operates as a subsidiary of Finquest Financial Solutions Private Limited.

2.Name: Mr. Satish  Shah
2.Title: CFO and VP of Accounts & Fin.
